Appointment for 2nd #COVIDVaccine dose is not made automatically as it provides #COVID19Vaccine beneficiaries flexibility of dates/place can potentially help in reducing #COVID19 vaccine wastage. To (re)schedule your appointment, kindly refer to https://t.co/rwwa7VWx4E https://t.co/mo5SyVHCJ5

Yes, you can get vaccinated with 2nd #COVIDVaccine dose in any State/District. The only restriction is that you will be able to get vaccinated only on those #COVID19Vaccination centres which are offering the same #COVID19Vaccine as your 1st #COVID vaccine dose. https://t.co/3q5t1D5NeY
